200.description: Returns a greeting message

get.summary: Hello World endpoint

get.description: Securely checks if a user with the given email exists and its registration status. Only works with the email from your verified JWT.

200.description: Returns user existence and registration status.

401.description: Unauthorized - JWT is missing or invalid.

get.summary: Check if user needs to register

post.description: Creates a new user (defaults to student role) or links an existing supervisor account to the Clerk identity. Uses JWT validation to ensure secure registration without requiring pre-existing clerk_id.

requestBody.description: User data to create a new user or register an existing supervisor

201.description: User has been successfully created or registered.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input data (e.g., missing first/last name for new student).

401.description: Unauthorized - JWT is missing or invalid.

409.description: Conflict - User already registered, or non-supervisor account exists with this email.

post.summary: Create new user or register existing supervisor account

200.description: Return all active users.

get.summary: Get all users

get.description: Find a user by their email address.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address to search for (exact match)

200.description: Returns the user with the matching email.

get.summary: Search user by email

get.description: Find users by matching their first name. Will return multiple users if multiple matches are found.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First name to search for (case insensitive, partial match)

200.description: Return users matching the given first name.

get.summary: Search users by first name

get.description: Find users by matching their last name. Will return multiple users if multiple matches are found.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last name to search for (case insensitive, partial match)

200.description: Return users matching the given last name.

get.summary: Search users by last name

get.description: Find users associated with a specific research interest or skill tag. Returns all users that have the specified tag.

200.description: Return users with the specified tag.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid Tag ID format.

404.description: Not found - Tag does not exist.

get.summary: Search users by tag ID

get.description: Find users associated with any of the specified research interests or skill tags. Returns all users that have at least one of the specified tags.

200.description: Return users with any of the specified tags.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid Tag ID format in list.

404.description: Not found - One or more tags do not exist.

get.summary: Search users by multiple tag IDs

get.description: Retrieves a specific user by their unique identifier.

200.description: Return the user with the matching id.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid User ID format.

get.summary: Get user by id

patch.description: Update a user's information such as name, email, profile image, and registration status.

requestBody.description: The fields to update on the user

200.description: User has been successfully updated.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input data or ID format.

delete.description: Soft delete a user. Preserves data but marks user as deleted and they will no longer appear in regular queries.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid User ID format.

get.description: Retrieve a specific user with their student/supervisor profile, tags, and block relationships.

200.description: Return the user with the specified ID including all their relations.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid User ID format.

get.summary: Get user by ID with all related entities

get.description: Retrieves all tags assigned to a specific user with their priority ordering. Tags are sorted by priority where 1 is highest priority.

200.description: List of a user's tags with their priorities and tag details

400.description: Bad request - Invalid User ID format.

get.summary: Get all tags assigned to a user

put.description: Updates all tags for a user with the specified priorities. This operation replaces all existing tags with the new set provided.

requestBody.description: The new tags and priorities for the user. Priorities must be sequential starting with 1.

200.description: User tags updated successfully. Returns the new list of user tags with their priorities.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input, non-sequential priorities, duplicate priorities, or invalid tag IDs.

404.description: User not found or one or more tags not found.

put.summary: Set/Replace all tags for a user with priorities

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available tags in the system that can be used for searching and filtering users.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of all tags in the system

get.summary: Get all tags

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific tag identified by its UUID.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the tag with the given ID

404.description: Tag with the specified ID was not found in the system

get.summary: Get a tag by ID

get.description: Finds tags that are semantically similar to the specified tag, with optional minimum similarity threshold.

parameters.name: minSimilarity
parameters.description: Minimum similarity score threshold (0-1). Only tags with similarity scores above this value will be returned.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of similar tags with their similarity scores

404.description: Tag with the specified ID was not found in the system

get.summary: Get similar tags to a given tag

200.description: Returns an array of supervisor profiles

get.summary: Get all supervisors with optional filtering

200.description: Returns a supervisor profile

get.summary: Get a supervisor by User ID

200.description: Returns a supervisor profile

get.summary: Get a supervisor by ID

200.description: Supervisor profile updated successfully

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Limit the number of students returned

200.description: Returns an array of student profiles

get.summary: Get all students with optional filtering

409.description: Student profile already exists for this user

200.description: Returns a student profile

get.summary: Get a student by User ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the student profile

200.description: Returns a student profile with relations

get.summary: Get a student by ID with all relations

200.description: Returns a student profile

get.summary: Get a student by ID

200.description: Student profile updated successfully

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to update this profile

requestBody.description: New Tags and similarities for the application

200.description: Tags and similarities successfully imported

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid data or inconsistent tags and similarities

post.summary: Bulk import tags and their similarities

get.description: Calculate and retrieve a list of all supervisors with their compatibility scores for a specific student

200.description: List of supervisors with compatibility scores for the user

400.description: Bad request - Invalid User ID format.

get.summary: Get all supervisors with compatibility scores for a user

info.title: MatchMaker API
info.description: The MatchMaker API for matching students with thesis supervisors

exists.description: Whether a user with this email exists in our system

is_registered.description: Whether the user has completed registration. If exists=true and is_registered=true, go-to dashboard. If exists=true and is_registered=false, show registration form for supervisor. If exists=false, show registration form for student.

first_name.description: First name of the user. Required if creating a new student account.

last_name.description: Last name of the user. Required if creating a new student account.

clerk_id.description: User's Clerk ID. Available if the user is registered via Clerk.

is_registered.description: Whether user has completed registration and is linked to clerk auth provider

is_deleted.description: Whether user has been deleted (soft deletion)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when user was last updated

Role.description: User role in the system (STUDENT, SUPERVISOR, or ADMIN)

clerk_id.description: Clerk user ID for authentication (can only be set once)

role.description: User role in the system (STUDENT, SUPERVISOR, or ADMIN)

profile_image.description: URL to user profile image (null if not set)

is_registered.description: Whether user has completed registration process

is_deleted.description: Whether user has been soft deleted from the system

updated_at.description: Timestamp when user was last updated

student_profile.description: Student profile data if the user is a student

example.thesis_description: AI-based recommendation system for supervisor matching

supervisor_profile.description: Supervisor profile data if the user is a supervisor

example.bio: I specialize in AI and machine learning with 15+ years of industry and academic experience. My current research focuses on ethical AI applications in healthcare. I enjoy mentoring students who are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology.

tags.description: List of tags associated with this user and their priorities

blocked_users.description: List of users blocked by this user

blocked_by_users.description: List of users who have blocked this user

id.description: The unique identifier for the tag

created_at.description: The date and time the tag was created

updated_at.description: The date and time the tag was last updated

priority.description: Priority of this tag for the user (lower is higher priority)

created_at.description: When the user-tag association was created

updated_at.description: When the user-tag association was last updated

tags.description: An ordered list of tags with their priorities for the user. Replaces all existing tags for the user.

tag.description: The related tag with its full details

similarity.description: Similarity score between two tags (0-1, where 1 is identical)

bio.example: Professor specializing in artificial intelligence and machine learning

available_spots.description: Number of available spots for supervision

user_id.description: ID of the user associated with this supervisor profile

bio.example: Professor specializing in artificial intelligence and machine learning

available_spots.description: Number of available spots for supervision

thesis_description.description: Brief description of thesis or research interests
thesis_description.example: AI-based recommendation system for supervisor matching

user_id.description: ID of the user this student profile belongs to

created_at.description: Timestamp when the student profile was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the student profile was last updated

thesis_description.description: Brief description of thesis or research interests
thesis_description.example: AI-based recommendation system for supervisor matching

user_id.description: ID of the user this student profile belongs to

created_at.description: Timestamp when the student profile was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the student profile was last updated

supervision_requests.description: Supervision requests sent by this student

chat_requests.description: Chat requests sent by this student

thesis_description.description: Brief description of the student's thesis or research interests
thesis_description.example: AI-based recommendation system for supervisor matching

thesis_description.description: Brief description of the student's thesis or research interests
thesis_description.example: AI-based recommendation system for supervisor matching

tags.description: List of all tag names to be imported

similarities.description: List of similarity relationships between tags

supervisor_userId.description: The unique identifier of the supervisor in this match

compatibilityScore.description: Compatibility score between student and supervisor (0-1)

bio.example: Professor specializing in artificial intelligence and machine learning

pendingRequests.description: Number of pending requests for this supervisor
